Name: Division Bell
Ingredients: 30 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A mezcal inspired variation of the Last Word with a refreshing, spirit-forward blend of ingredients.
History: Created in 2009 by Phil Ward at Mayahuel, New York City, USA. Last Word history
Nutrition: One serving of Division Bell contains 152 calories
